# Search Items

# Description

Search items in Oracle NetSuite.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Name - The name of the product. This field supports String type input.
* MPN - The manufacturer part number of the product. This field supports String type input.
* UPC - The UPC code of the product. This field supports String type input.
* External ID - The external identifier of the product. This field supports String type input.





* Items - Automatically generated output variable.
